thread.title: Great location and fun, light-filled design
thread.title_full: Great location and fun, light-filled design - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: C_and_N2001
title: Great location and fun, light-filled design
text:
We really enjoyed the fun design and hip-nature of this hotel (without it's being pretentious at all). The location is excellent... just steps away from London's theatres, and a short 2-3min walk to the National Gallery and National Portrait Gallery.
The design of the rooms is very nice, light, and airy. We recommend getting a room with a city view on a higher floor for sure (Floor 6 is the highest).
Suggestions for improvement: please put coffee / tea machines in the rooms. What up-scale hotel rooms don't offer this service anymore?
